short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the extension to load Twitch chat onto YouTube live page, replacing YouTube chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your YouTube live streaming experience by embedding Twitch chat directly onto any YouTube page with a chatbox, replacing YouTube's own chat. This extension seamlessly integrates Twitch chat, allowing you to enjoy the best of both platforms.

Click once to choose a Twitch chat, double-click to switch chats.

Features:
• Seamless Integration: Click the extension icon to load Twitch chat on a YouTube live page, replacing the default YouTube chat.
• Channel Mapping: Automatically maps preset YouTube channels to their corresponding Twitch usernames for easy access.
• Persistent Settings: Saves entered Twitch streamers to local storage, so you don't have to re-enter them each time.
• Dynamic Chat Resizing: Adjusts the Twitch chat to match the height of the YouTube video for a consistent viewing experience.
• Dark Mode Support: Automatically detects and applies dark mode settings to the Twitch chat if your YouTube is set to dark mode.
• Quick Chat Switch: Double-click the extension icon to quickly change the Twitch chat being displayed.

Twitch Chat for YouTube™
